posts.title: A Reading List for America
posts.text: A reading list in response to recent events and to help foster literacy of the American Black experience.

posts.title: Scholarship Behind "Ghetto, The Invention of a Place, the History of an Idea"
posts.text: A list of primary sources at the heart of Ghetto, The Invention of a Place, the History of an Idea, by Dr. Mitchell Duneier

posts.title: Ta-Nehisi Coates's Reading List
posts.text: "Folks who are not familiar with black literature, read this book and read a ton of other books." The following are all the books recommended by Ta-Nehisi Coates during his mesmerizing talk at the Schomburg Center.
